snippet.title: Asphalt Xtreme - Now Available on iOS, Android and Windows Platforms!
snippet.description:
No Road. No Rules, Go Xtreme! Join the world-renowned Asphalt series for a trip on the wild side! Download Asphalt Xtreme now on iOS, Android and Windows* devices: http://gmlft.co/Play_AXtreme

*Note: On Windows, it is already available in many countries and coming to the others very soon!


To get the latest news from Asphalt, follow us on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AsphaltGame 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/asphalt
Instagram:https://www.instagram.com/asphaltgames
Official Forum: http://gmlft.co/AsphaltForum

******
©2016 gameloft All Rights Reserved.
